hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
chmod 755 *.*
./updaterepo.sh /Users/hscbuild01/jenkins-slave/codebase/ENV/LIVE/GHS-iOS-code ${WORKSPACE} ghs.ios.${BUILD_NUMBER}.tar origin/master
chmod -R 755 ${WORKSPACE}
mkdir -p ${WORKSPACE}/repo
mkdir ${WORKSPACE}/repo/${BUILD_NUMBER}/

cd ${WORKSPACE}/repo/${BUILD_NUMBER}
echo "The latest LIVE build will be uploaded to hockeyapp in few minutes">read_this-${BUILD_NUMBER}.ipa

/Applications/Xamarin?Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/mdtool -v build "--configuration:OPS|iPhone" -p:Grocery.iPad Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS.sln ENT_BUILD=`find ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iPad/bin/iPhone/OPS/ -name *.ipa -exec basename {} \; ` mv ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iPad/bin/iPhone/OPS/${ENT_BUILD} ${WORKSPACE}/repo/${BUILD_NUMBER}/Grocery-iPad-OPS-${BUILD_NUMBER}.ipa
/Applications/Xamarin?Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/mdtool -v build "--configuration:OPS|iPhone" -p:Grocery.iOS Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS.sln ENT_BUILD=`find ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS/bin/iPhone/OPS/ -name *.ipa -exec basename {} \; ` mv ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS/bin/iPhone/OPS/${ENT_BUILD} ${WORKSPACE}/repo/${BUILD_NUMBER}/Grocery-iOS-OPS-${BUILD_NUMBER}.ipa

/Applications/Xamarin?Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/mdtool -v build "--configuration:TIE|iPhone" -p:Grocery.iPad Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS.sln ENT_BUILD=`find ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iPad/bin/iPhone/TIE/ -name *.ipa -exec basename {} \; ` mv ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iPad/bin/iPhone/TIE/${ENT_BUILD} ${WORKSPACE}/repo/${BUILD_NUMBER}/Grocery-iPad-TIE-${BUILD_NUMBER}.ipa
/Applications/Xamarin?Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/mdtool -v build "--configuration:TIE|iPhone" -p:Grocery.iOS Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS.sln ENT_BUILD=`find ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS/bin/iPhone/TIE/ -name *.ipa -exec basename {} \; ` mv ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS/bin/iPhone/TIE/${ENT_BUILD} ${WORKSPACE}/repo/${BUILD_NUMBER}/Grocery-iOS-TIE-${BUILD_NUMBER}.ipa

/Applications/Xamarin?Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/mdtool -v build "--configuration:DBT|iPhone" -p:Grocery.iPad Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS.sln ENT_BUILD=`find ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iPad/bin/iPhone/DBT/ -name *.ipa -exec basename {} \; ` mv ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iPad/bin/iPhone/DBT/${ENT_BUILD} ${WORKSPACE}/repo/${BUILD_NUMBER}/Grocery-iPad-DBT-${BUILD_NUMBER}.ipa
/Applications/Xamarin?Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/mdtool -v build "--configuration:DBT|iPhone" -p:Grocery.iOS Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS.sln ENT_BUILD=`find ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS/bin/iPhone/DBT/ -name *.ipa -exec basename {} \; ` mv ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS/bin/iPhone/DBT/${ENT_BUILD} ${WORKSPACE}/repo/${BUILD_NUMBER}/Grocery-iOS-DBT-${BUILD_NUMBER}.ipa

/Applications/Xamarin?Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/mdtool -v build "--configuration:STORE5|iPhone" -p:Grocery.iPad Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS.sln ENT_BUILD=`find ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iPad/bin/iPhone/STORE5/ -name *.ipa -exec basename {} \; ` mv ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iPad/bin/iPhone/STORE5/${ENT_BUILD} ${WORKSPACE}/repo/${BUILD_NUMBER}/Grocery-iPad-STORE5-${BUILD_NUMBER}.ipa
/Applications/Xamarin?Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/mdtool -v build "--configuration:STORE5|iPhone" -p:Grocery.iOS Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS.sln ENT_BUILD=`find ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS/bin/iPhone/STORE5/ -name *.ipa -exec basename {} \; ` mv ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS/bin/iPhone/STORE5/${ENT_BUILD} ${WORKSPACE}/repo/${BUILD_NUMBER}/Grocery-iOS-STORE5-${BUILD_NUMBER}.ipa

/Applications/Xamarin?Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/mdtool -v build "--configuration:STORE6|iPhone" -p:Grocery.iPad Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS.sln ENT_BUILD=`find ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iPad/bin/iPhone/STORE6/ -name *.ipa -exec basename {} \; ` mv ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iPad/bin/iPhone/STORE6/${ENT_BUILD} ${WORKSPACE}/repo/${BUILD_NUMBER}/Grocery-iPad-STORE6-${BUILD_NUMBER}.ipa
/Applications/Xamarin?Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/mdtool -v build "--configuration:STORE6|iPhone" -p:Grocery.iOS Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS.sln ENT_BUILD=`find ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS/bin/iPhone/STORE6/ -name *.ipa -exec basename {} \; ` mv ${WORKSPACE}/Apps/Grocery/iOS/Grocery.iOS/bin/iPhone/STORE6/${ENT_BUILD} ${WORKSPACE}/repo/${BUILD_NUMBER}/Grocery-iOS-STORE6-${BUILD_NUMBER}.ipa
